SINGLE.description: Single channel   Diagnosis only for the reported channel

ACCUMULATIVE.description: Multiple channel   Accumulative diagnosis from more than one channel

ALL_DISAPPEARS.description: The Diagnosis ASE contains no longer any entries (of any severity) for this channel

APPEARS.description: An event appears and/or exists further  The Diagnosis ASE contains this and possible other entries for this channel.

DISAPPEARS.description: An event disappears and/or exists no longer  The Diagnosis ASE contains no longer any entries of the same severity for this channel

DISAPPEARS_OTHER_REMAIN.description: An event disappears  The Diagnosis ASE still contains other entries of the same severity for this channel

UNSPECIFIC.description: Shall be used if the field ChannelNumber contains the value 0x8000 (submodule)  Furthermore, it shall be used if none of the below defined types are appropriate.

S1BIT.description: The data length of this channel is 1 Bit.

S2BIT.description: The data length of this channel is 2 Bit.

S4BIT.description: The data length of this channel is 4 Bit.

S8BIT.description: The data length of this channel is 8 Bit.

S16BIT.description: The data length of this channel is 16 Bit.

S32BIT.description: The data length of this channel is 32 Bit.

S64BIT.description: The data length of this channel is 64 Bit.

Message.description: Diagnosis message read from the GSDML

HelpText.description: Help text read from the GSDML

Message.description: Diagnosis message read from the GSDML

HelpText.description: Help text read from the GSDML

Date.description: New I&M2 | IM_Date to be written remanent to the device.

Descriptor.description: New I&M3 | IM_Descriptor to be written remanent to the device.

Tag_Selector.title: IMTagSelectorEnumeration
Tag_Selector.description: If 1, Tag_Function shall be written, If 2, Tag_Location shall be written, if 3 both.

Tag_Function.description: String containing the new I&M1 | IM_Tag_Function to be written remanent to the device.

Tag_Location.description: String containing the new I&M1 | IM_Tag_Location to be written remanent to the device.

items.title: PnIM5DataType
items.description: Contains the fields of the APDU element I&M5 | I&M5Data

CONNECTED.description: The AR connection to the device is established

UNCONNECTED.description: The AR connection to the device is not established

UNCONNECTED_ERR_DEVICE_NOT_FOUND.description: The AR connection to the device is not established because the device is not available in the network

UNCONNECTED_ERR_DUPLICATE_IP.description: The AR connection to the device is not established because the IP address of the device exists multiple times

UNCONNECTED_ERR_DUPLICATE_NOS.description: The AR connection to the device is not established because the Name of Station of the device exists multiple times

IOSAR.description: The supervisor AR is a special form of the IOCARSingle allowing takeover of the ownership of a submodule

IOCARSingleUsingRT_CLASS_3.description: This is a special form of the IOCARSingle indicating RT_CLASS_3 communication

IOCARSR.description: The SR AR is a special form of the IOCARSingle indicating system redundancy or dynamic reconfiguration usage

OFFLINE.description: The device is not online, or no information is available. The device is offline if no ARs other than possible Device Access ARs exist.

OFFLINE_DOCKING.description: The device is a docking device and currently not online.

ONLINE.description: The device is online. This is the case if at least one AR other than possible Device Access ARs exists.

ONLINE_DOCKING.description: The device is a docking device and currently online.

IO_DEVICE.description: The device contains an IO device interface.

IO_CONTROLLER.description: The device contains an IO controller interface.

IO_MULTIDEVICE.description: The device contains multiple IO device interfaces.

IO_SUPERVISOR.description: The device contains an IO supervisor interface.

IO_CIM.description: The device contains an CIM device interface.

NameOfStation.description: String containing the new NameOfStation to be written remanent to the device. The maximum length shall be limited to 240 characters (See [PN Protocol] for details).

DORMANT.description: In pending state waiting  for some external event

DISABLED_DISCARDING.description: The port is administratively disabled and discarding frames

LISTENING.description: The port is listening to and sending BPDUs (Bridge Protocol Data Units).

PROPER_MODULE.description: Module is okay but at least one submodule is locked, wrong or missing

SUBSTITUTE.description: Module is not the same as requested  but the IO device was able to adapt by its own knowledge

S1BIT.description: The data length of this channel is 1 Bit.

S2BIT.description: The data length of this channel is 2 Bit.

TAKEOVER_NOT_ALLOWED.description: This Submodule is not available for takeover by IOSAR.

OWN.description: This AR is owner of the submodule

APPLICATION_READY_PENDING.description: This AR is owner of the submodule but it is blocked. For example parameter checking pending

SUPERORDINATED_LOCKED.description: This AR is not owner of the submodule. It is blocked by superordinated means

LOCKED_BY_IO_CONTROLLER.description: This AR is not owner of the submodule. It is owned by another IOAR

LOCKED_BY_IO_SUPERVISOR.description: This AR is not owner of the submodule. It is owned by another IOSAR
